text:
Carrick was delusional in his interpretation on how the team performed. They were lucky to get a way with a point. Sure it‚Äôs better than what they have done for the past 3 months, after the win against Villarreal, and a draw here at Stamford bridge, but they‚Äôve been underperforming even being 8th in the league shows it.

¬†@LR TV HIGHLIGHTS ¬† I am not from Merseyside but used to live and work in Crosby. If I was back there I would support Everton make no mistake. I am old enough to remember The Golden Vision. What a player he was, Alex. As a kid I watched Everton win League titles and F A Cups. The great team of Harry Catterick era and later Ball, Kendall Harvey. Sharp and Gray up front. Your boys thrilled me. I am sad and alarmed to see Everton lose to Little Brentford. Why Rafa was appointed , God only knows. Because he still had house on Merseyside ? You guys felt sorry for him ? Everton would have been better off giving the job to Duncan Ferguson who will have learned a lot under Ancelotti. I came into Liverpool for another job 2 years ago. The taxi driver drove  past Goodison. What a thrill it was  just to see the ground. You live in a great city. And great people the Scouse people, salt of the earth. 
Maybe Wayne will rescue Derby, earn his corn, and come back to manage his boyhood club ?  Mid table mediocrity is not the Everton way !
